name: 9th International Conference on Emerging Trends in Electrical, Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering
content: 9th International Conference on Emerging Trends in Electrical, Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering (EEI 2024) March 09 \~ 10, 2024, Virtual Conference https://eeie2024.org/index Scope & Topics 9th International Conference on Emerging Trends in Electrical, Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering (EEI 2024) aims to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on recent systems and techniques in the broad field of electrical, instrumentation and communication Engineering. Original research papers, state-of-the-art reviews are invited for publication in all areas of Electrical Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following • Semiconductor Devices • Non Conventional Energy Resources • Analog and Digital Circuit Design • RF and Microwave Engineering • Optical Networks & Communication • Information Systems and Network Security • Remote Sensing and Satellite Communication • Bio Informatics • Advanced Power System & Control System • Sensor Technology & Virtual Instrumentation • VLSI Technology & Design • Digital Signal Processing • Biomedical Instrumentation • Embedded Systems and Robotics • Power Electronics & Electric Drives • System Modeling & Simulation • Mechatronics & Avionics • Optimization Techniques • Soft Computing / Nano computing/ Grid computing Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by March 02, 2024(Final Call). Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Electrical and Electronics Engineering: An International Journal (ELELIJ) (Confirmed). Selected papers from EEI 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal. • International Journal of Soft Computing, Mathematics and Control (IJSCMC) • Circuits and Systems: An International Journal (CSIJ) • Emerging Trends in Electrical, Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering: An international Journal (EEIEJ) • Electrical Engineering: An International Journal (EEIJ) • International Journal on Cybernetics & Informatics (IJCI) Important Dates Third batch (Submissions after Jan 29, 2024) • Submission Deadline: March 02, 2024 (Final call) • Authors Notification: March 07, 2024 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due: March 08, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us: eeie@eeie2024.org (or) eei\_conference@yahoo.com
